definition[0]: a small round white object that forms inside an oyster, and is a valuable jewel
example[1]: a string of pearls (=a necklace made of pearls)
definition[1]: a hard shiny substance of various colours formed inside some shellfish, which is used for making buttons or to make objects look attractive
definition[2]: a small round drop of liquid
example[2]: the pearls of the morning dew
definition[3]: someone or something that is especially good or valuable
